definition: palindrome

sentences.english: Find the largest palindrome made from the product of two 3-digit numbers.
sentences.chinese: 找出兩個三位數乘積所能製造處的最大回文數。

sentences.english: Find the largest palindrome made from the product of two 3-digit numbers.
sentences.chinese: 請找出由兩個三位數的積構成的最大回文數。
